Description:
[b] I spend hundreds of hours making maps for you guys without any benefits. I created a patreon so you can help me getting money out of it. If you like this map please consider a donation. [/b] 
https://www.patreon.com/gidek
(1000$ goal reach = start of Hide and Seek #2 development)

Join my discord if you have questions, recommandations, or need help setting up multiplayer workshop maps, im there to help you : https://discord.gg/UPVzqBP

~~~
Here it is! A quidditch competitive oriented map; no mutators, only skill!

This map is meant for a high skill gameplay, if you are under C2 you should probably add a light ball mutator or rumble so you don't struggle too much to score.

[u]Game Rules :[/u] 

NO MUTATORS

Low Ring = 1pt 
Medium Ring = 2pts
High Ring = 3 pts



Q: Another Quidditch map?

Yes. I played the glhglh map a while ago, it was fun but it lacked competitive aspects, so i created my own version of quidditch.


Psyonix if you read this, as you can see we can make great maps using only assets from Rocket League, 0% copyrighted content here. So please, give us custom maps support, thank you.
